attributes.additional_details: For people who are not aware of this, Quinolone is a 'family' of drugs that people take to kill of bacteria, however, with that comes potential lethal side effects. It can range from Tendinitis to permanant Tendon Rupture. Just like myself, other people either are of have suffered with the side effects that have changed their lives. I urge anyone who is or has gone through this to please sign this petition so that the government take notice and begin the process to ban these types of drugs.
